name: Live
description:
No one ever said that life is easy. Fight your way through it in a short story-driven game that guides you in your journey from childhood to senility. What challenges will you stand up against? Will you earn what should be yours? Will you find out what it means to Live?

The game is a short, yet difficult mix of platformer and other genres assembled together in order to support the narration.

                     Featurng:
  • Crazy gameplay
  • Earbug soundtrack
  • 2D photogrammetry (kindof)
